local_intent: Grasp the fridge handle securely using a pull strategy and verify the grasp.
assumptions: Handle is reachable and not blocked
Pregrasp approach may need refinement via ApproachAndAlign
coherence_with_global: Matches global sequence around grasp: perceive handle or scan fallback, align, open gripper, compute pull grasp to 'grasp_handle', retry pick, then verify grasp stability and object in gripper.
